mainText:
I'm shocked and speechless. 
 
This horrible news has popped up on my iphone just a quarter ago at 2:15 a.m. while I was watching one of the Steve's presentation on youtube looking for inspiration for my show tomorrow.
 
I always looked at him as a role model of innovation, great vision and passion. 
I wish I could have met him :(.
 
Please accept my most sincere condolences on the loss of Steve
author: Michal
